name: YouTube Native 720p Player (March 2013)
description:
**Now updated to work with the new YouTube layout (20th March 2013)**

Resizes the YouTube video player to display 720p videos in their native resolution, perfect for users with high resolution screens.
additional_info:
**CHANGE LOG**

21/03/13
 -Changed CSS class names for compatibility with 20/03/13 update

10/12/12
 -Fixed playlist bar width

07/12/12
 -Updated to work with new YouTube layout
